instruction: Summarize the benefits of a digital advertising campaign
output: Digital advertising campaigns offer a number of benefits, such as the ability to reach a wide and global audience, create targeted campaigns, track and measure performance in real-time, and adjust campaigns on the fly. Digital advertising can also help establish a personal connection with potential customers, as ads can be tailored to the needs and preferences of the target audience. Additionally, digital advertising is more cost-effective as it requires less resources than traditional advertising, and have higher conversion rates as ads can be displayed to potential customers who are more likely to take action.
